name: Captain Anne Bonnie
description: The fruity flavor of fresh nectarine is enhanced with Combier Peche liqueur in this cocktail from Back 40 West in New York.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 lime (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, muddle nectarine half. Add rum, lime, Cynar, and peach liqueur, then fill shaker with ice. Shake until very cold, about 10 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
